## Colophon

Notebook built using [notestar](https://github.com/tjmahr/notestar), a notebook
system that uses [targets](https://github.com/ropensci/targets) to create a
[bookdown](https://bookdown.org/) document. Theme is
[water.css](https://watercss.kognise.dev/) as provided by the [cleanrmd
package](https://github.com/gadenbuie/cleanrmd).
